## LoadInfo type

Represents the information about the error that was thrown while loading an item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type LoadInfo = {
    $type?: string;
    readonly ErrorMessage?: string;
    readonly ErrorType?: ErrorType;
    readonly State?: LoadInfoState;
};
```

**References:** [ErrorType](./open-api-client.errortype.md)<!-- -->, [LoadInfoState](./open-api-client.loadinfostate.md)
